mapper.select: SELECT mg.mgid, mg.member_grade_status, mg.mgdesc, m.member_id FROM member_grade_tbl mg JOIN member m ON mg.member_id = m.member_id WHERE m.member_id = #{memberId}

select wt.item_id as itemId, wt.bid_item_id as bidItemId, bit.bid_item_name as bidItemName, (SELECT MAX(bt.bid_reg_price) FROM bids_tbl bt WHERE bt.bid_item_id = bt.bid_item_id) AS bidNowPrice, bit.max_price as maxPrice, bit.item_status as itemStatus, i.item_nm as itemNm, i.item_sell_status as iSellStatus, i.price as price, i.stock_number as stockNumber from wishlist_tbl wt left join bid_items_tbl bit on wt.bid_item_id = bit.bid_item_id join `member` m on wt.member_id = m.member_id left join item i on wt.item_id = i.item_id where wt.created_by =#{createdBy}
